language.description:
Canonical source(s): Baron 1983

Baron, Wietze. (1983) Kwomtari Survey. Unpublished manuscript, SIL Survey office, Ukarumpa, now posted at link accessed 15 Dec 2008.  

Laycock, Donald C. (1975) Sko, Kwomtari and Left May (Arai) Phyla. In Stephen A. Wurm (ed.), New Guinea Area Languages and Language Study Vol 1: Papuan Languages and the New Guinea linguistic scene (Pacific Linguistics: Series C 38), 849-858. Canberra: Research School of Pacific and Asian Studies, Australian National University.
